            Hi! ðŸ‘‹ I am a biophysical
            chemist joining the PhD program (Chemistry) at University of
            Virginia in Fall 2023. I am primarily interested in
            understanding the structural intricacies as well as dynamics
            of biological molecules at nano and sub-nano
            scales.Understanding such biological mysteries will lead to
            development of next-gen therapeutics against many
            diseases.
            
            Education
            Kalinga Institute of Technology (KIIT) |
            Odisha, India
            M.Tech. in Biotechnology (Specialization -
            Nanotechnology) | 2021
            Kalinga Institute of Technology (KIIT) |
            Odisha, India
            B.Tech. in Biotechnology | 2020
            
            
            Experience
            ICMR-NICED | Junior Research Fellow |
            September 2021 - March 2023
            CSIR-IICB | Masterâ€™s thesis Intern |
            January 2021 - June 2021
